Happy Hour
Happy Hour
Renegade's Restaurant
1171 Co Rd 309, Crescent City, FL, United States
We are happy to announce our new extended Happy Hour times now starting at 2pm and ending at 7pm Monday through Thursday. Come get a drink and enjoy the next one on us! Buy one get one on our house wines, wells, and draft beer. Offer is available in the restaurant and at the Tiki Bar.

Terms & Conditions
About Us
What started out seven years ago as a dream has grown into a hidden gem on the
St. Johns River. We have a well-seasoned staff looking forward to making you
r
time with us a special occasion. Located a couple hundred feet from the St. Jo
h
ns River, our riverside Tiki bar awaits with cool refreshments and live entertainment.
Renegades Restaurant
Just up the hill we offer a wide range of food ranging from burgers to grass fed steaks. If you prefer things on the spicy side, then you will love our Rustic Shrimp and Grits, Blackened Redfish with our own jalapeno grits, and Gator tail with chipotle aioli sauce. Steamed shrimp or crab legs are waiting for the person
who does not mind getting messy. Whether its our regular menu or Chef’s fresh
fish specials, it is our goal to provide you with a wonderful experience.
Stay a While
Whether you are staying with us for the season or stopping in for the day,
w
e offer a one-of-a-kind experience. Our amenities include a full-service
restaurant with a full-service bar, Tiki bar with live entertainment five days a
week, cabins, RV sites, marina, and bait store. Come experience Renegades and become part of our family.
Located at mile marker 65 on St. John's River
Have a Question ?
Give us a call
